name: OSHI
description:
• Genre: 2D puzzle platformer game

• Target Audience: Age 14+

• Look and Feel: Dark and flat colours

• Game Engine: Developed in Unity 2D

Adventure through this mysterious world, paint with light
and help Oshi, a luminiscent creature, survive in the darkness.

Use light to attract enemies and activate traps.
Never play the same level twice!

“OSHI” is a 2D puzzle platformer for mobile that uses the light as a core mechanic.

The game setting is dark, and the light appears in two ways in the game:

• The main character who is a luminescent being;

• The light that can be used to paint on the screen.

The enemies are only seen when they are illuminated by light and may have various behaviors towards it (they may be attracted, flee and not be affected at all). The idea of using light is to be able to devise strategies against the enemies. Like luring them to a specific location or against each other and into traps as well. This means that the character kills the enemies but never directly.

Main Content:

  • 6 tutorial levels
  • 3 different types of enemies
  • 2 typef of traps
  • Procedural Level generation
